content: st p2tog repeat round 20 knit 2tog around cut yarn leaving an 8 tail pull through live stitches to bind off weave in ends 2 cowl cast on 95 stitches using a 16 us #10 needle join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place marker for beginning of round *knit 3 purl 2* repeat around save about 1 yard of yarn to bind off bind off all stitches knitwise weave in ends abreviations k knit p purl p2tog purl 2 stitches together k2tog knit 2 stitches together copyright andrea riddle 3
